Timothy Wall wrote:

> You can certainly write a class loader that *doesn't* delegate loading
> to the parent/primordial, but that path is fraught with exceptions and
> errors (of the ClassCast and Linkage types) and painstaking to get
> exactly right.

The good news is that, if you test-drive the solution, you'll leave 
behind a trail of tests that will let you know the moment you go off the 
rails in future. It may just be the only safe/sane way to do it. :)
